item.description:
Join players of advanced beginner and up levels as we work on our swing, serve, volleys, and games. Braintree High School offers plenty of opportunity to play tennis on its 6 tennis courts and two practice backboards. Courts are available for up to 2 hours.

*Please Note: This is NOT instructional. Therefore, you should have a basic knowledge of the game, how to use the racket, know the rules and know how to volley. You should be at least a 1.5 or Advance Beginner.  

Fees: none, however, donations are welcome, as the organizer pays for the monthly fees out of pocket.

Location: Braintree High School Tennis Courts, 128 Town Street (Enter off Franklin St/Route 37) Braintree, MA 02184

Note: Please bring your own racket and balls.  Thank you

In Case of Inclement Weather:  Heavy rains or wet courts will cancel via email.

~~~~~~~~~~~ Directions: On the "Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us on the courts

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Tennis - For advanced beginners and up
